alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Bleckley; Houston; Peach; Pulaski; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Bibb, northwestern Pulaski, southwestern Twiggs, southwestern Bleckley, Peach and Houston Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Powerville to near Tarversville, and moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Cochran, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Robins AFB, Hayneville, Tarversville, Meadowdale, Robins Air Force Base, Houston Lake, Grove Park, Royal, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Powerville, Moss Oak, Paulk, Porter, and Miami Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Bleckley; Houston; Peach; Pulaski; Twiggs
